DOC.brief_title: Safety Epidural Fentanyl Adrenalin During Childbirth
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy woman indication labor epidural Labor Clinic , Rikshospitalet University Hospital , may include . A randomized , placebocontrolled , double blind , comparison epidural without adrenalin .
